RDB scans a relation or a set of relations,
while an RDF engine scans over all data. Thus, 
RDB engines outperform RDF engines
RDB only has indexes on primary keys, while 
an RDF engine has indexes over combinations 
of subject, predicate, and object. Thus, RDF 
engines outperform RDB engines
